thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com
thread.title: belial420

author: belial420
title: belial420
text: We purchase wholesale but some of the vendors on here are not good sales people for example we bought digital scales and they all came soaked in water we sent pictures of the damaged items and did we get reimbursed No we did not, We were robbed buy this company nore did they send replacements And customer service did not help, and this is not the only incedent, Be careful who you buy from because you can not return anything without a hassle or the company doesn't reimburse you at all, not good salesmanship
